remarks.format:
## Remarks This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>. That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
